about.title: About me
about.caption: Curious about me? Here you have it:
about.text1: I'm a passionate, self-proclaimed designer who specializes in full stack development (React.js & Node.js). I am very enthusiastic about bringing the technical and visual aspects of digital products to life. User experience, pixel perfect design, and writing clear, readable, highly performant code matters to me.

contact.title: Contacts
contact.text: What’s next? Feel free to reach out to me if youre looking for a developer, have a query, or simply want to connect.
contact.feedbackButton: Or you can fill out the feedback form and I will contact you
contact.descr: You may also find me on these platforms!

feedback.name: Name
feedback.agreement: I hereby agree to the Terms of processing of my personal data. *
